name: New Media Learning
overview:
New Media Learning provides online compliance courses to companies and institutions in the U.S.

New Media Learning is committed to providing training programs that respect both the participants and the sensitivity of the subject matter. Since its initial founding and focus on its Preventing Sexual Harassment training, New Media Learning has evolved to become a full-service e-learning company that offers its customers comprehensive courses for all their online training needs.

The companyâ€™s flagship Preventing Sexual Harassment course has been selected by many leading organizations including RAND Corporation, Schering-Plough, Tommy Hilfiger, Unisys, the University of California , the United States Department of Labor, Wells Fargo, and Winstar Communications.
